Translations.Text: wa-idha surifat absaruhum til'qaa ashabi l-nari qalu rabbana la tajʿalna maʿa l-qawmi l-zalimina
wanada ashabu l-aʿrafi rijalan yaʿrifunahum bisimahum qalu ma aghna ʿankum jamʿukum wama kuntum tastakbiruna
ahaulai alladhina aqsamtum la yanaluhumu l-lahu birahmatin ud'khulu l-janata la khawfun ʿalaykum wala antum tahzanuna
wanada ashabu l-nari ashaba l-janati an afidu ʿalayna mina l-mai aw mimma razaqakumu l-lahu qalu inna l-laha harramahuma ʿala l-kafirina
alladhina ittakhadhu dinahum lahwan walaʿiban wagharrathumu l-hayatu l-dun'ya fal-yawma nansahum kama nasu liqaa yawmihim hadha wama kanu biayatina yajhaduna
walaqad ji'nahum bikitabin fassalnahu ʿala ʿil'min hudan warahmatan liqawmin yu'minuna

hal yanzuruna illa tawilahu yawma yati tawiluhu yaqulu alladhina nasuhu min qablu qad jaat rusulu rabbina bil-haqi fahal lana min shufaʿaa fayashfaʿu lana aw nuraddu fanaʿmala ghayra alladhi kunna naʿmalu qad khasiru anfusahum wadalla ʿanhum ma kanu yaftaruna

inna rabbakumu l-lahu alladhi khalaqa l-samawati wal-arda fi sittati ayyamin thumma is'tawa ʿala l-ʿarshi yugh'shi al-layla l-nahara yatlubuhu hathithan wal-shamsa wal-qamara wal-nujuma musakharatin bi-amrihi ala lahu l-khalqu wal-amru tabaraka l-lahu rabbu l-ʿalamina
id'ʿu rabbakum tadarruʿan wakhuf'yatan innahu la yuhibbu l-muʿ'tadina
wala tuf'sidu fi l-ardi baʿda is'lahiha wa-id'ʿuhu khawfan watamaʿan inna rahmata l-lahi qaribun mina l-muh'sinina

wahuwa alladhi yur'silu l-riyaha bush'ran bayna yaday rahmatihi hatta idha aqallat sahaban thiqalan suq'nahu libaladin mayyitin fa-anzalna bihi l-maa fa-akhrajna bihi min kulli l-thamarati kadhalika nukh'riju l-mawta laʿallakum tadhakkaruna
wal-baladu l-tayibu yakhruju nabatuhu bi-idh'ni rabbihi wa-alladhi khabutha la yakhruju illa nakidan kadhalika nusarrifu l-ayati liqawmin yashkuruna
laqad arsalna nuhan ila qawmihi faqala yaqawmi uʿ'budu l-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu inni akhafu ʿalaykum ʿadhaba yawmin ʿazimin
qala l-mala-u min qawmihi inna lanaraka fi dalalin mubinin
qala yaqawmi laysa bi dalalatun walakinni rasulun min rabbi l-ʿalamina
uballighukum risalati rabbi wa-ansahu lakum wa-aʿlamu mina l-lahi ma la taʿlamuna
awaʿajib'tum an jaakum dhik'run min rabbikum ʿala rajulin minkum liyundhirakum walitattaqu walaʿallakum tur'hamuna
fakadhabuhu fa-anjaynahu wa-alladhina maʿahu fi l-ful'ki wa-aghraqna alladhina kadhabu biayatina innahum kanu qawman ʿamina
